org.sdnplatform.sync.internal.config.bootstrap

Class BootstrapClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sdnplatform.sync.internal.config.bootstrap.BootstrapClient

  • public class BootstrapClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes an attempt to bootstrap the cluster based on seeds stored in the local system store

    readams
